sentences.en: "He's been arrested for theft and burglary." — "Good grief!"
sentences.cn: “他因为偷窃和入室盗窃而被逮捕了。”——“我的天哪！”

sentences.en: Chris was weeping in anger and grief.
sentences.cn: 克丽丝悲愤交加，失声痛哭。

sentences.en: Every change in our lives brings with it griefs.
sentences.cn: 我们生活当中的每一个变化都有让人伤心的一面。

sentences.en: He thought his heart would burst with grief.
His grief was etched into every line of his face.
I had reacted in a fury of grief.
In a strange way she seemed ennobled by her grief.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，忧伤使她显得更加高贵。

sentences.en: many a ship has come to grief along this shore.
sentences.cn: 很多船只都在这一带沿海遇难。

sentences.en: Nothing can prepare you for the shock and grief of widowhood.
sentences.cn: 守寡的打击和悲伤让人难以承受。

sentences.en: So many marriages have come to grief over lack of money.
sentences.cn: 许多婚姻都因缺钱而以失败告终。

sentences.en: Talk to others about your feelings of loss and grief.
sentences.cn: 把自己的失落和悲伤向他人倾诉。

sentences.en: The grief she felt over Helen’s death was almost unbearable.
sentences.cn: 她因海伦的去世而悲痛难当。

sentences.en: The loneliness and grief comes in waves.
sentences.cn: 孤独和悲伤不断涌上心头。

sentences.en: The mother, numb with grief, has trouble speaking.
sentences.cn: 那位母亲因过于悲痛而说不出话来。

sentences.en: The Queen was grief-stricken over his death.
sentences.cn: 女王为他的去世悲痛不已。

sentences.en: They rent their clothes in grief.
sentences.cn: 他们在悲痛之中扯碎了自己的衣服。

sentences.en: We all felt as if we were intruding on his private grief.
sentences.cn: 我们都觉得似乎触及到了他内心的伤痛。

phrases.tran_cn: 哎呀！天哪！（表示诧异， 吃惊， 恐惧的感叹语）
［用以表示惊奇或恐慌］哎呀，天哪

trans.tran_en: extreme sadness, especially because someone you love has died
